timeline.message:
Address comments from https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/fda-mystudies/pull/202

Changes:

* Remove .json keys from .gitignore, since they're no longer manually managed.
* Move the audit bucket to us-east1 like all the other resources.
* Replace a CLIENT_ID with a dummy test value in a k8s deployment.
* Use the right port for the user-registration-server-np.
* Fork the k8s deployment.yaml files, to avoid clobbering the working ones.

timeline.author: xingao267
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,67 +1,61 @@
 # TODO: Rename this from study-meta-data to study-server.
-apiVersion: apps/v1
-kind: Deployment
-metadata:
-  name: study-meta-data
-  labels:
-    app: study-meta-data
-spec:
-  replicas: 1
-  selector:
-    matchLabels:
-      app: study-meta-data
-  template:
-    metadata:
-      labels:
-        app: study-meta-data
-    spec:
-      containers:
-        - name: study-meta-data
-          image: gcr.io/heroes-hat-dev-apps/study-meta-data:latest
-          env:
-            - name: DB_USER
-              valueFrom:
-                secretKeyRef:
-                  name: study-meta-data-db-credentials
-                  key: username
-            - name: DB_PASS
-              valueFrom:
-                secretKeyRef:
-                  name: study-meta-data-db-credentials
-                  key: password
-            - name: DB_NAME
-              valueFrom:
-                secretKeyRef:
-                  name: study-meta-data-db-credentials
-                  key: dbname
+apiVersion: apps/v1

replies.bodyText: Not exactly, the files in early-access already have them. I just ran git checkout early-access -- deployment.yaml on each of them, so they're the same as in that branch.
replies.author: MartinPetkov
